column1: I believe the children are the future... Unless we stop them now!
column2: Marriage is like a coffin and each kid is another nail.
column3: Marriage is like a coffin and each kid is another nail.
column5: For once maybe someone will call me "sir" without adding, "You're making a scene."
column6: And this is the snack holder where I can put my beverage or, if you will, cupcake.
